name: The Sunny Day 晴天
summary: In the story, the player plays the KUI, a 14-year-old girl with mental illness, who falls into her own spiritual world for an unknown reason during a daily activity. Players must pass through puzzles and various strange characters to communicate. The player's attitude toward various items in the game will affect the outcome of the game. Please feel free to feel the inner world of this lonely and desperate protagonist.
